Istanbul.

::Slayer::

"Allright." Slayer says, changing course to head to the specified location. He activates his scanners as he nears it, trying to find the exact location.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius scans the land and seems surprised to have such detailed scanners.
> "North by Northeast." he scans further for the Trainer markings, "Its
> located on the land bridge west of  a small body of water, and South of what
> the humans will call the Black Sea." (Can anyone tell me what major city is
> nearby?)
